properties.Observatio: A well-developed water scheme is in operation. There is a stock tank and filtering system. The boundaries of the land where the stock tank and filters are built (20 perch) are not marked.
properties.Descriptio:
Fabricating & fixing security weld mesh in open-type buildings in GI weld mesh 50mm x 50mm SWG 10, welded on 40mm x 40mm x 5mm angle frame complete with application of two coats enamel paint over two coats of anticorrosive paint and complete.
All as per

properties.Name_of_th: Water distributes through a pipeline directly from the spring
properties.Observatio: Already developed. There are no boundaries are not marked. This area may be about  20 perches of which about 45% are large trees.
properties.Descriptio:
Planting trees in the allocated area

Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x

properties.Observatio: This spring is located on Borment janapadaya reserve.  A spring is well-improved. There are no boundaries are not marked. This area may be about  1 acres of which about 50% are large trees.
